feed.title: Channel-Port aux Basques - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WRECKHOUSE WIND WARNING, Channel-Port aux Basques
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 p.m. NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY, Channel-Port aux Basques
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:36 p.m. NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.1Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port aux Basques 7:30 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 72 %
Dewpoint: -3.4°C
Wind: WNW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain or snow. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow changing to rain near midnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming east 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 110 in the Wreckhouse area late in the evening and after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023
